==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|type=211}}

===Etymology===
* '''109 - 91 {{B.C.E.}}:''' [[w:Sima Qian|Sima Qian]], ''[[w:Records of the Grand Historian|Records of the Grand Historian]]'', "The Biography of the [[Marquess]] of [[w:Hán Xìn|Huai Yin]]"
*: [[劉邦|上]][[常]][[從容]][[與]][[韓信|信]][[言]][[諸]][[將]][[能]][[不]]，[[各]][[有]][[差]]。[[劉邦|上]][[問]][[曰]]：「[[如]][[我]][[能]][[將]][[幾何]]？」[[韓信|信]][[曰]]：「[[陛下]][[不]][[過]][[能]][[將]][[十]][[萬]]。」[[劉邦|上]][[曰]]：「[[於]][[君]][[何如]]？」[[曰]]：「[[臣]]'''多多而益善'''[[耳]]。」 (''[[Traditional Chinese|trad.]]'')
*: &nbsp;
*: [[刘邦|上]][[常]][[从容]][[与]][[韩信|信]][[言]][[诸]][[将]][[能]][[不]]，[[各]][[有]][[差]]。 [[刘邦|上]][[问]][[曰]]：「[[如]][[我]][[能]][[将]][[几何]]？」 [[韩信|信]][[曰]]：「[[陛下]][[不]][[过]][[能]][[将]][[十]][[万]]。」 [[刘邦|上]][[曰]]：「[[于]][[君]][[何如]]？」 [[曰]]：「[[臣]]'''多多而益善'''[[耳]]。」 (''[[Simplified Chinese|simp.]]'')
*:: ''[[w:Liu Bang|His majesty]] chatted with [[w:Hán Xìn|Han Xin]] about the capabilities of the generals. Each had their shortcomings. [[w:Liu Bang|His majesty]] asked, "How many troops could I lead?" [[w:Hán Xìn|Han Xin]] replied, "Your highness should not lead more than 100,000." [[w:Liu Bang|His majesty]] said, "And what about you?" "For your humble servant, '''the more the merrier'''!" said [[w:Hán Xìn|Han Xin]].''
* This quote lead to the famous saying: {{zh-l|韓信點兵，多多益善}} ([[w:Hán Xìn|Han Xin]] counts his troops, '''the more the merrier''').
